document.full_text: the tent hospital erected to replace the medical center destroyed by the tornado that tore through here on may 22 is up and running with an operating room, beds for dozens of patients, an imaging center and lab.
document.title: mom opens free chow line at joplin's temporary tent hospital
lines_and_colors: the tent hospital erected to replace the medical center destroyed by the tornado that tore through here on may 22 is up and running with an operating room, beds for dozens of patients, an imaging center and lab.
